meanings.definition: A small, thin piece of meat resembling a steak.
meanings.sent1: I grilled a delicious steakette for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The steakette was sizzling on the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The steakette jumped off the plate and did a little dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as juicy and satisfying as a perfectly cooked steakette.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the steakette filled the room, making everyone's mouth water.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare a steakette.
meanings.sent1: I will steakette the meat on the stove.
meanings.sent2: She steaketted the beef with care and precision.
meanings.sent3: The chef steaketted the steakette while juggling tomatoes.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed was like a chef steaketting a perfect steakette.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the steakette as it cooked was music to her ears.
